1.12.2.0.1.0:
-gaining levels through staying under the sky on a full moon night
-transform into a werewolf on full moon
-several commands
-base for goblin
-really buggy werewolf villager
-pure silver stuff
-server compatibility
1.12.2.1.0.0-beta1:
Added new structures, animations, sounds, models, commands and translations.
Created a base for vampires and hunters and added campfires and tents, new skills, aconite, monkshood, cotton and a hunter armor!
For the full changelog, see: https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.0.0-beta1%20Changelog.md
